com.untitled.game.character

Class Character<I extends java.lang.Enum,S extends java.lang.Enum,P extends java.lang.Enum>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.untitled.game.Entity<I,S,P>
      • com.untitled.game.LivingEntity<I,S,P>
        • com.untitled.game.character.Character<I,S,P>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Assassin, Tank

    public abstract class Character<I extends java.lang.Enum,S extends java.lang.Enum,P extends java.lang.Enum>
extends LivingEntity<I,S,P>
    A LivingEntity with certain debuff definitions. Also can use 3 abilities: Primary, Secondary, Tertiary.
